cards

Class Chance

  • java.lang.Object
    • cards.Card
      • cards.Chance

  • public class Chance
extends Card
    The Chance class extends the Card class as its parent. This Class implements the abstract method dealWithCard for Chance cards of different types
    Author:
    Robert Keenan and Ciaran Nolan

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Chance(java.lang.String cardType, java.lang.String cardDesc, int cardValue)
      This is the Constructor which has the same arguments of its parent class of type, description and value

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void dealWithCard(Player player, java.io.BufferedReader userInput)
      Deal with card function which takes an input of player object and either reduces the money of player (PAY), gives money to player (INCOME), sends them to Jail (JAIL) or gives them a Get out of Jail card (GET_OUT_OF_JAIL) depending on a switch statement determined by the card's type

      • Methods inherited from class cards.Card

        getCardDesc, getCardType, getCardValue, setCardDesc, setCardType, setCardValue, toString

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Chance

        public Chance(java.lang.String cardType,
              java.lang.String cardDesc,
              int cardValue)
        This is the Constructor which has the same arguments of its parent class of type, description and value
        Parameters:
        cardType - The type of card such as MOVE, PAY, INCOME
        cardDesc - The actual text on the card
        cardValue - The value of the card such as how many spaces to move or how much money you have received

    • Method Detail

      • dealWithCard

        public void dealWithCard(Player player,
                         java.io.BufferedReader userInput)
        Deal with card function which takes an input of player object and either reduces the money of player (PAY), gives money to player (INCOME), sends them to Jail (JAIL) or gives them a Get out of Jail card (GET_OUT_OF_JAIL) depending on a switch statement determined by the card's type
        Specified by:
        dealWithCard in class Card
        Parameters:
        player - A player object which these actions can be applied to
        userInput - BufferedReader used for simulating user input for much more complex tests in JUnit
